      • statisticCountry

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> statisticCountry()
        Query the database country statistics
        Returns:
        list with strings with the following layout: "y: x" , where y is a specific country and x is the number of participants in that country

      • statisticSport

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> statisticSport()
        Query the database sport statistics
        Returns:
        list with strings with the following layout: "y: x" , where y is a specific sport and x is the number of participants in that country
